name: Dinopuzzle for toddlers
description:
"Dinopuzzle" is a fun puzzle game intended for kids between ages 2 and 6.

"Dinopuzzle" takes children on a journey, where they encounter a wide variety of dinosaurs. Using drag-and-drop actions, the pieces of the puzzle can be arranged into the proper places to form the animals, and once successful, the kids are rewarded with an exciting display of sounds and flowers.
